name: Goodbye Lullaby再见摇篮曲
intro:
艾薇儿的个人第四张全新大碟正式敲定，排上行程，这张专辑名为“Goodbye Lullaby”，在2011年三月全球发行，首波主打单曲“What The Hell”也在2011年一月发行，艾薇儿本人在2010年12月31日的纽约Dick Clark's跨年晚会上首次演唱这首新歌。

艾薇儿在AMA的红毯上公布了自己新专辑的名称，这个名字的公布也让我们对新专辑多了更多的期待，从LET GO 到The Best Damn Thing，艾薇儿总是能带来巨大的惊喜，而这个名字也从侧面突出了这张新专辑艾薇儿会给我们带来一种前所未有的感觉。


December 7, 2010 – Two years in the making, singer-songwriter Avril Lavigne's fourth studio album, Goodbye Lullaby, will be released by RCA Records on March 8, 2011. Lavigne will debut the first single "What the Hell" on New Year's Eve during "Dick Clark's Rockin' New Year's Eve." Lavigne worked with longtime collaborators Deryck Whibley, Evan Taubenfeld and Butch Walker, as well as songwriter/producer Max Martin. Lavigne continues to share her personal experiences through her writing and music, and Goodbye Lullaby is a further evolution of this, propelled by a more raw and organic sound. Among its upbeat tracks are "What the Hell," an unabashed embrace of fun and freedom, and "Stop Standing There," fueled by an early-‘50s girl-group feel. The album runs the gamut of emotions: Lavigne expresses her gratitude for special people in her life in the rocker "Smile," explores the dynamics of a relationship in "Push," shows her vulnerable side in "Wish You Were Here," and finds the strength to close one chapter of her life and move on to the next in the title track "Goodbye." Outside the recording studio, Lavigne is a successful entrepreneur who continues to design and direct her lifestyle apparel brand, Abbey Dawn, which has expanded its worldwide footprint and will be shipping to 50+ countries beginning this month. Along with her popular fragrance Black Star, she recently introduced Forbidden Rose and is launching a third fragrance in 2011. This September, Lavigne's past charitable work also inspired her to create The Avril Lavigne Foundation. The Foundation works in partnership with leading charitable organizations to design and deliver programs, raise awareness, and mobilize support for children and youth living with serious illnesses or disabilities. Avril Lavigne has made an indelible mark on the music community, selling more than 30 million albums worldwide, earning eight Grammy nominations and seven Canadian Juno Awards. She burst onto the music scene in 2002 with the critically acclaimed Let Go, featuring the smash singles "Sk8r Boi" and "Complicated." Her 2004 release, Under My Skin, debuted at #1 on the Billboard charts, as did her third album, The Best Damn Thing, which produced the irrepressible #1 single "Girlfriend" and logged more than 130 million views on YouTube! Lavigne also wrote the song "Alice" for Tim Burton's critically acclaimed Disney Film Alice in Wonderland.

comments.brief: 喜欢她以前的歌，最近的就比较少听，但还是很喜欢她的
专辑不难听，很多歌都很上耳，但是风格实在太颠覆所以特别败粉丝。专辑整体性还不错，黑星和再见首尾呼应得很漂亮，但像这种注重表情达意的慢情歌专辑对表达的要求很高，事实证明Avril在这方面的能力还是有所欠缺...本身对于情歌能力的局限加上专辑制作的重重阻挠，专辑质量略显尴尬...
这张专辑具有创造性的一张专辑，整体走抒情摇滚风格，我非常喜欢这张专辑，同时也更希望艾薇儿，↖(^ω^)↗，加油啊！创造出更好的一张专辑。
这么屌的专辑，这么niubility的小魔女！让我们这么不厌其烦的等待了4年！还用多说什么，多解释什么吗？喜欢就这两字，什么都没有了！爱死她了！只能说，4年的等待，值了，太TM值了！爱死Avril了！
艾薇儿拉维妮的歌声一直是我最喜欢的类型，朋克和流行的那种。这张专辑里的歌和之前的其他专辑有许多不同吧，朋克的感觉少了些，不过还是很喜欢的！
艾薇儿总是能带来的惊喜，这个名字也从侧面突出艾薇儿会给我们带来一种前所未有的感觉。
初中开始听，高一很疯狂，前三张专辑。听了Alice之后，再也不想听了，曾经有多喜欢，现在有多讨厌。

好听 但是已经不再是昨天的她了…… 结婚是个错。
每个人都阻止不了长大成熟，年少的你是如此的叛逆不羁，你结婚，离婚，当年的朋克少女成熟了，曲调改变了，歌词变了，唯一不变的是你的嗓音，对音乐对执着；依稀记得那青葱年华，那时我们都还年轻，感谢你的声音陪我度过无数个白天与黑夜
很容易就听出来了她的改变，从一个张扬的小女孩变成一个成熟的小妇人，一个人经历的多了，总要有些改变的吧，虽然没有了那时候的张扬和不羁，依然喜欢她，因为她的声音，对我来说，承载了太多的美好或者不美好的记忆，年轻的记忆。
还是喜欢原始的你，最初的不修边饰，最真实，纯粹
新专辑《Goodbye Lullaby》很好听，超赞！才华、个性、美貌集一身。不红都难。
永远喜欢那个无邪不羁的女孩声音！
